CustomField.description: A number field representing the periodicity of recurring gifts. The number in this field is "12" if someone has monthly payments set up, "4" if someone has quarterly payments set up, etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A number field representing the periodicity of recurring gifts. The number in this field is "12" if someone has monthly payments set up, "4" if someone has quarterly payments set up, etc.
CustomField.label: Recurring Periodicity
